goal.ch:
1.了解空氣品質觀測之儀器特性、觀測原理與應用。(20％)
2.了解衛星、光達等大氣遙測之基礎原理。(20％)
3.了解濕沈降觀測儀器與被動採樣方法。(20％)
4.了解資料分析與應用。(20％)
5.參與空氣品質監測站運作與資料處理。(20％)
goal.en:
Understand the characteristics of air quality observation instruments, observational principles, and applications. (20％)
Understand the basic principles of atmospheric remote sensing using satellites and LiDAR. (20％)
Understand the instruments for wet deposition observation and passive sampling methods. (20％)
Understand data analysis and applications. (20％)
Participate in the operation and data processing of air quality monitoring stations. (20％)

outline.ch: 現代人越來越注重空氣品質，但各式空氣污染問題依然層出不窮，而要瞭解空氣污染物對於環境生態以及人體健康的危害，或是要解決空污問題，需先掌握環境背景及污染現況，了解空氣污染物的濃度、時空分布及傳輸，才能據以提出合適的因應對策。環境測計主要由大氣系兩位專精於空污研究的老師共同授課，本課程將介紹各式空氣污染物量測技術，涵蓋氣態污染物量測、粒狀污染物量測、濕沈降採樣、被動採樣、無人機觀測，以及光達與衛星遙測。本課程也規劃戶外教學，讓同學藉由參觀測站及作業單位，引導學生對觀測實務與應用的深入了解。修習此課程後，學生能具備關於空氣品質觀測之知識與技能。
outline.en:
Modern individuals are increasingly concerned about air quality, yet various air pollution issues continue to emerge. To understand the harm that air pollutants pose to environmental ecology and human health, or to solve air pollution problems, it is essential to grasp the environmental background and current pollution status. This includes understanding the concentration, spatiotemporal distribution, and transmission of air pollutants, which will enable the formulation of appropriate response strategies.
The environmental measurement course is co-taught by two professors specializing in air pollution research from the atmospheric sciences department. This course will introduce various air pollutant measurement techniques, covering gaseous pollutant measurement, particulate matter measurement, wet deposition sampling, passive sampling, drone observations, as well as LiDAR and satellite remote sensing. The course also includes outdoor teaching activities, allowing students to visit monitoring stations and operational units, guiding them to gain a deeper understanding of observational practices and applications. After completing this course, students will acquire knowledge and skills related to air quality monitoring.
